name: Full Heart
description:
Whenever two fighters collide, regardless of which one is doing the hitting, and which one is getting hit, both fighters suffer a little.
So when your opponent went and split your life in two, and locked your other half in a cage, no matter how skilled you are, it won't be enough. You simply won't be strong enough to win unless you find your other half and gain back your full power.

CONTROLS:

Left/Right arrows = Move
Down arrow = Change direction
Up arrow = Jump
A = Punch
S = Block
D = Dropkick

INSTRUCTIONS:

Whenever you damage your opponent, your own health drops by half of the damage
When you block, the damage from your opponent's attack is halved
